search.query: `ed_index` event IN ("FSSDiscoveryScan", "FSSAllBodiesFound") | eval Progress=if(event=="FSSAllBodiesFound", 1, Progress) | eval BodyCount=coalesce(BodyCount, Count) | dedup SystemName sortby -_time | stats sum(BodyCount) as total_body_count sum(NonBodyCount) as total_non_body_count avg(Progress) as avg_progress latest(Progress) as latest_progress latest(BodyCount) as latest_body_count latest(NonBodyCount) as latest_non_body_count latest(SystemName) as latest_system_name

`ed_index` event=Scan | sort - _time | fillnull value="None" TerraformState | eval TerraformState=if(TerraformState!="", TerraformState, "None") | lookup ed_scan_payouts.csv PlanetClass TerraformState OUTPUT FullScanPayout FDFullScanPayout | eval FullPayout=if(WasDiscovered=="false", FDFullScanPayout, FullScanPayout) | eval StarOrPlanetType=coalesce(StarType, PlanetClass) | eval Landable=if(Landable=="true", if(SurfaceGravity/10 >= 1, "HighG (" .round(SurfaceGravity/10, 2) ." G)", "Yes (" .round(SurfaceGravity/10, 2) ." G)"), "No")
| join type=left SystemAddress BodyID [search `ed_index` event=SAAScanComplete | eval isMapped="true" | eval withEfficiencyBonus = if(ProbesUsed <= EfficiencyTarget, "true", "false") | table SystemAddress BodyID isMapped withEfficiencyBonus]
| join type=left SystemAddress BodyID [search `ed_index` event=SAASignalsFound | rename Signals{}.Count AS SAASignals Signals{}.Type_Localised AS SignalsTypeLocalised Signals{}.Type AS SignalsType | eval SAASignalType=if(like(SignalsType, "_SAA%"), SignalsTypeLocalised, SignalsType) | table SystemAddress BodyID SAASignals SAASignalType]
| join type=left SystemAddress BodyID [search `ed_index` event=FSSBodySignals | rename Signals{}.Count AS FSSSignals Signals{}.Type_Localised AS SignalsTypeLocalised Signals{}.Type AS SignalsType | eval FSSSignalType=if(like(SignalsType, "_SAA%"), SignalsTypeLocalised, SignalsType) | table SystemAddress BodyID FSSSignals FSSSignalType]
| eval Signals=coalesce(SAASignals, FSSSignals) | eval SignalType=coalesce(SAASignalType, FSSSignalType) | fillnull value="None" SignalType | fillnull value=0 Signals | fillnull value="None" AtmosphereType
| lookup ed_planet_k_values PlanetClass TerraformState OUTPUT k | lookup ed_star_k_values StarType OUTPUT k | eval k = coalesce(k, if(StarType=="*", 1200, 300)) | eval q = 0.56591828 | eval isFirstDiscoverer = if(WasDiscovered=="false", "true", "false"), isFirstMapped = if(WasMapped=="false" AND isMapped="true", "true", "false") | eval mappingMultiplier = if(isMapped=="true", if(isFirstDiscoverer=="true" AND isFirstMapped=="true", 3.699622554, if(WasMapped=="false", 8.0956, 3.3333333333)), 1) | eval mass = coalesce(MassEM, StellarMass) | eval value=(k + k * q * pow(mass, 0.2)) * mappingMultiplier ```we just assume its odyssey``` | eval value = if("$token_isOdyssey$"=="true", if(isMapped=="true", value + max(value*0.3, 555), value), value) | eval value = if(isMapped=="true" AND withEfficiencyBonus=="true", value*1.25, value) | eval value = max(value, 500) | eval value = if(isFirstDiscoverer=="true", value * 2.6, value) | eval value = if("$token_carrierSell$"=="true", value * 0.75, value) | eval value = round(value, 0)
| rename WasDiscovered AS Discovered WasMapped AS Mapped DistanceFromArrivalLS AS Distance | eval Payout=tostring(FullPayout, "commas") +" CR / " +tostring(value, "commas") +" CR" | table _time BodyName StarOrPlanetType Discovered Mapped TerraformState AtmosphereType Signals SignalType Landable Payout Distance value FullPayout
`ed_index` event=FSDJump | stats latest(_time) as _time count(StarSystem) as count by StarSystem | eval Duplicate=if(count>1, "Yes", "No") | sort - _time | fields StarSystem _time Duplicate
| dedup BodyName | stats sum(value) as TotalPayout
| table _time BodyName StarOrPlanetType Discovered Mapped TerraformState AtmosphereType Signals SignalType Landable Payout Distance

format.colorPalette: {"K":#F8BE34,"G":#F8BE34,"B":#F8BE34,"F":#F8BE34,"O":#F8BE34,"A":#F8BE34,"M":#F8BE34,"High metal content body":#F1813F,"Water world":#006D9C,"Metal rich body":#F8BE34,"Sudarsky class II gas giant":#708794,"Rocky body":#EC9960,"Ammonia world":#B6C75A,"Earth-like world":#53A051,"Icy body":#62B3B2,"Earthlike body":#53A051}
